name: iunex
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: The existence of an indexed union. ` x ` is normally a free-variable parameter in the class expression substituted for ` B ` , which can be read informally as ` B ( x ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.)
